articles.title: Monkey Island Updates Stop After Online Abuse  - IGN Daily Fix - IGN
articles.description: On today’s IGN The Fix: Games, Return to Monkey Island director Ron Gilbert will no longer talk about the game online due to the amount of abuse he has received, particularly about its new art style. The much-maligned remake of XIII is now being, well, remade…
